response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, we propose a purchase price of $1,350,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with a competitive advantage while ensuring a fair return for us. We look forward to discussing this further and hope to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 1350000}
